title: OMG POSSIBLE LEONA SKIN
body: Ok guys tell me if this is good or bad idea but why not baker Leona. She can have a kneading roller as a sword and a baking tray as a shield and she can be wearing oven mitts and a apron and maybe a dress that the women wore in the 50s. Please please please Riot make this skin work.

replies.body: The funny thing riot (as far as I know) has ever took in a new champion or skin idea and created it.

Void Fizz as well.

They actually take in skin ideas very often.
River spirit Nami is one i think.
